mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.title, e.description, e.views, e.created_at, e.created_by_email, e.duration_id, d.label AS duration, e.likes, e.file_path, e.language_level_id, l.level, l.label AS levelLabel, e.category_id, c.name AS category, e.external_id FROM core.exercise e LEFT JOIN core.language_level l ON e.language_level_id = l.id LEFT JOIN core.category c ON e.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN core.duration d ON e.duration_id = d.id

SELECT e.id, e.title, e.description, e.views, e.created_at, e.created_by_email, e.duration_id, d.label AS duration, e.likes, e.file_path, e.language_level_id, l.level, l.label AS levelLabel, e.category_id, c.name AS category, e.external_id FROM core.exercise e LEFT JOIN core.language_level l ON e.language_level_id = l.id LEFT JOIN core.category c ON e.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN core.duration d ON e.duration_id = d.id WHERE e.external_id = #{externalId}
